mapper.select: SELECT articles.article_id, comment.comment_content,user.user_id as uid,user.user_nick_name FROM comment INNER JOIN articles ON comment.article_id = articles.article_id INNER JOIN user ON comment.uid = user.user_id;

SELECT id,articles.article_id, comment.comment_content,user.user_id as uid,user.user_nick_name FROM comment INNER JOIN articles ON comment.article_id = articles.article_id INNER JOIN user ON comment.uid = user.user_id WHERE comment.article_id = #{id};
mapper.update: UPDATE articles SET view_count = view_count + 1 WHERE article_id = #{articleId};
UPDATE articles SET view_count = view_count - 1 WHERE article_id = #{articleId};
mapper.select: SELECT article_id,a.user_id as user_id,article_title,article_content,article_create_time,article_last_update_time, like_count,view_count,user_nick_name FROM articles a INNER JOIN user u ON a.user_id = u.user_id WHERE a.del_flag = 0 AND a.article_id IN ( SELECT article_id FROM comment WHERE uid = #{id} ORDER BY article_last_update_time DESC )
